titleStmt.title: [T]o the right honourable, [the betrusted knights, citizens, [illegible] i]n the Commons House of Parliament (Englands legall soveraign power) the humble petition of the inhabitants of Buckingham-shire, and Hartfo[rd]shire, whose names are hereunto subscribed.
titleStmt.author: Overton, Richard, fl. 1646.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
